name: ChickenCat
description:
Chicken and Cat are stuck together in a superimposed state. They share the same location, but only one is truly active at a time. Use their unique controls to guide them to the exit. Can you get all the coins?

This is my first GameJam project, made for the GMTK 2021 Jam. The theme is Joined Together. As Chicken and Cat share the location and the player must flip between using them, I would say the two are rather joined together.

I hope you have fun!
